apis.description: Get the filing history list of a company

operations.summary: Get the filing history of the company

parameters.name: company_number
parameters.description: The company number that the single filing is required for.

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: The transaction id that the filing history is required for.

responseMessages.message: Filing history not available for this company

apis.description: Get the filing history list of a company

operations.summary: Get the filing history of the company

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: One or more comma-separated categories to filter by (inclusive).

parameters.name: company_number
parameters.description: The company number that the filing history is required for.

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: The number of filing history items to return per page.

parameters.name: start_index
parameters.description: The index into the entire result set that this result page starts.

responseMessages.message: Filing history not available for this company

category.description: The category of the document filed.

date.description: The date the annotation was added.

description.description: A description of the annotation.  For enumeration descriptions see `description` section in the enumeration mappings file.

description_values.description: Map of data values used to populate place holder id's in the description member

category.description: The category of the document filed.

date.description: The date the associated filing was processed.

description.description: A description of the associated filing.  For enumeration descriptions see `description` section in the enumeration mappings.

description_values.description: Map of data values used to populate place holder id's in the description member

type.description: The type of the associated filing.

filing_history_status.description: The status of this filing history.

items_per_page.description: The number of filing history items returned per page.

kind.description: Indicates this resource is a filing history.

start_index.description: The index into the entire result set that this result page starts.

total_count.description: The total number of filing history items for this company.

associated_filings.description: Any filings associated with the current item

transaction_id.description: The transaction ID of the filing.

category.description: The category of the document filed.

date.description: The date the filing was processed.

description.description: A description of the filing.  For enumeration descriptions see `description` section in the enumeration mappings.

description_values.description: Map of data values used to populate place holder id's in the description member

links.description: Links to other resources associated with this filing history item.

pages.description: Number of pages within the PDF document (links.document_metadata)

paper_filed.description: If true, indicates this is a paper filing.

subcategory.description: The sub-category of the document filed.

category.description: The category of the resolution filed.

description.description: A description of the associated filing.  For enumeration descriptions see `description` section in the enumeration mappings.

description_values.description: Map of data values used to populate place holder id's in the description member

document_id.description: The document id of the resolution.

receive_date.description: The date the resolution was processed.

subcategory.description: The sub-category of the document filed.

type.description: The type of the associated filing.

self.description: Link to this filing history item.

document_metadata.description: Link to the document metadata associated with this filing history item. See the Document API documentation for more details.
